verses.text: Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the name of the LORD; praise \add him\add* , O ye servants of the LORD.
Ye that stand in the house of the LORD, in the courts of the house of our God,
Praise the LORD; for the LORD \add is\add* good; sing praises to his name; for \add it is\add* pleasant.
For the LORD hath chosen Jacob to himself, \add and\add* Israel for his peculiar treasure.
For I know that the LORD \add is\add* great, and \add that\add* our LORD \add is\add* above all gods.
Whatever the LORD pleased, \add that\add* did he in heaven, and in earth, in the seas, and all deep places.
He causeth the vapors to ascend from the ends of the earth; he maketh lightnings for the rain; he bringeth the wind out of his treasuries.
Who smote the first-born of Egypt, both of man and beast.
\add Who\add* sent tokens and wonders into the midst of thee, O Egypt, upon Pharaoh, and upon all his servants.
Who smote great nations, and slew mighty kings;
Sihon king of the Amorites, and Og king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan:
And gave their land \add for\add* a heritage, a heritage to Israel his people.
Thy name, O LORD, \add endureth\add* for ever; \add and\add* thy memorial, O LORD, throughout all generations.
For the LORD will judge his people, and he will repent concerning his servants.
The idols of the heathen \add are\add* silver and gold, the work of men's hands.
They have mouths, but they speak not; eyes have they, but they see not.
They have ears, but they hear not; neither is there \add any\add* breath in their mouths.
They that make them are like them: \add so is\add* every one that trusteth in them.
Bless the LORD, O house of Israel: bless the LORD, O house of Aaron:
Bless the LORD, O house of Levi: ye that fear the LORD, bless the LORD.
Blessed be the LORD out of Zion, who dwelleth at Jerusalem. Praise ye the LORD.
